docs.content:
## How to do automatic resizing of Textbox based on their content?

Use the `Can Grow` and `Can Shrink` properties with Textbox report items. This will grow and shrink Textbox height vertically based on their content.

![Visibility property](./images/can-grow-property.png)
docs.description: This documentation explains how to do automatic resizing of Textbox based on their content using the `Can Grow` and `Can Shrink` properties.
